meanings.sent1: The peacock was one of the most beautiful preeners in the aviary.
meanings.sent2: The preeners in the mirror admired their appearance before the party.
meanings.sent3: The preeners in the park spent hours fixing their hair and clothes.
meanings.sent4: She was a preener, always making sure every detail of her outfit was perfect.
meanings.sent5: The preeners at the fashion show strutted confidently down the runway.

meanings.definition: An instrument used for preening feathers.
meanings.sent1: The birdwatcher used a delicate preeners to groom the feathers of injured birds.
meanings.sent2: The preeners in the vet clinic were essential for caring for the injured owl.
meanings.sent3: The preeners in the bird sanctuary were carefully stored to keep them safe.
meanings.sent4: The preeners gently smoothed out the feathers of the injured sparrow.
meanings.sent5: The preeners were meticulously crafted to ensure they wouldn't harm the birds.

meanings.sent1: After the rain, the cat preeners itself to remove the dirt from its fur.
meanings.sent2: The model preeners before every photoshoot to look their best.
meanings.sent3: The dog preeners happily after a bath, feeling clean and fresh.
meanings.sent4: She preeners meticulously before the important job interview.
meanings.sent5: The bird preeners its feathers with precision, ensuring they are in perfect condition.
